import React, { useEffect } from "react"; import { Table, Button } from "react-bootstrap"; import "./Account.css"; import "../../shared/style/common.css"; const Account = () => { const userId = 1; const email = "johndoe@email.com"; const username = "johnnybravo69"; return (
Profile
Email: {email}
Username: {username}
Actions
); }; export default Account;
